text.en: Homage to the Guru!
text.en-trans: lama la chaktsal lo

text.en: Oceanic victorious ones, residing throughout all
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum kün na zhukpa yi

text.en: The ten directions and three times, consider me!
text.en-trans: tsa sum gyalwa gyatso gong su sol

text.en: Grant your blessings so that this, my aspiration,
text.en-trans: dak gi jitar tsampé mönlam di

text.en: May be fulfilled just so, without impediment.
text.en-trans: gekmé drubpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Lord of Sages, protector Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: tubpé wangpo gönpo jamyang dang

text.en: Invincible Vajrapāṇi, Maitreya and the rest,
text.en-trans: ma pam chakdor jampa lasokpa

text.en: Victors and your heirs, great bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: gyal dang dé sé sempa ché nam dang

text.en: Saraha, Nāgārjuna, Asaṅga and the rest,
text.en-trans: sara ha dang ludrub tokmé sok

text.en: Great pioneers who beautify this world,
text.en-trans: dzamling dzepé shingta ché nam dang

text.en: Padmākara, Vimala, Vairotsana, Dharma King,
text.en-trans: pejung bi ma bai ro chögyal dang

text.en: Ma,2Nyak,3, Kawa,4Chok,5Lord Atiśa,
text.en-trans: ma nyak ka chok jowo ati sha

text.en: Rinchen Zangpo, great Ngok Lotsāwa and the rest—
text.en-trans: rin zang ngok lochen po lasokpa

text.en: Ocean-like hosts of scholars and adepts
text.en-trans: khé dang drubpa gyatsö tsok nam ni

text.en: Whose excellent words, as they appeared in India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: pak bö rimpar jönpé lekpar sung

text.en: Were elucidated through teaching and through practice.
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé tralwar dzepa yi

text.en: Though my own unerring study, contemplation and meditation
text.en-trans: do ngak ka dang tenchö mengak nam

text.en: On the Words of sūtra and mantra, the treatises and instructions,
text.en-trans: manor jizhin tö sam gompa yi

text.en: May I be of service to these teachings of the Victorious Ones.
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten la jawa jepar shok

text.en: May the delightful mansion of renunciation and discipline
text.en-trans: ngejung tsultrim khang zang nyamgawar

text.en: Be filled with the riches of altruistic concern and bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: zhenpen changchub sem kyi nor gyi chuk

text.en: The victory banner of secret mantra Vajrayāna raised aloft,
text.en-trans: sang ngak dorjé tekpé gyaltsen dreng

text.en: And the world throng with holders of the three sets of vows.
text.en-trans: dom sumden pé nordzin khyabpar shok

text.en: As the twofold saṅgha covers the surface of the Earth,
text.en-trans: sateng tamché gendün dé nyi kyi

text.en: May all its members maintain perfect harmony,
text.en-trans: gang zhing dedak kün kyang tuktün pé

text.en: Exert themselves in the activities of renunciation and study,
text.en-trans: pang dang lokpé jawar tsönpa dang

text.en: And cause the Sugata’s teachings to flourish throughout the ten directions.
text.en-trans: deshek tenpa chok chur gyepar shok

text.en: May the savage thoughts and actions of asuras and barbarians,
text.en-trans: ten la khuwé lhamin lalo yi

text.en: Who are hostile to the teachings, be brought to an end.
text.en-trans: samjor ngenpé duktsub gyün chö ching

text.en: And through the force of mighty Raudracakrin’s compassion,
text.en-trans: rikden drakpo khorlo chenpo yi

text.en: May we attain perfect victory in the battle with evil forces.
text.en-trans: tukjé shuk kyi yul lé namgyal shok

text.en: May all the countries of this vast world be rich with tenfold virtue,
text.en-trans: yangpé gyalkham tamché gé chü jor

text.en: May all the disharmony and darkness of these times be pacified,
text.en-trans: mitün dü kyi münpa kün zhi né

text.en: And may the youthful sun of happiness dawn
text.en-trans: dé dang gelek gyatrak nangwa yi

text.en: To shine its myriad rays of goodness and well-being.
text.en-trans: kyipé nyima zhönnu charwar shok

text.en: May all who are connected with me purify misdeeds and obscurations,
text.en-trans: dak la drel tok tamché dikdrib dang

text.en: Pacify their suffering and increase longevity, merit and wisdom.
text.en-trans: dukngal zhi né tsesö yeshe gyé

text.en: May they attain the level of supreme awakening,
text.en-trans: changchub chok gi gopang tobpa dang

text.en: And gain mastery of an ocean of immaculate qualities.
text.en-trans: zakmé yönten gyatsor wangjor shok
